name: mk-targets-runner
description: Run makefiles and justfiles targets from the command palette

commands.title: Targets Runner: Re-Run Last Executed Target

mk-targets-runner.command.make.markdownDescription:
The command to run makefiles targets.

- `<fsPath>` will be replaced with the makefile path.
- `<name>` will be replaced with the target name.
- `<dir>` will be replaced with the makefile directory.

mk-targets-runner.command.just.markdownDescription:
The command to run justfiles targets.

- `<fsPath>` will be replaced with the justfile path.
- `<name>` will be replaced with the target name.
- `<dir>` will be replaced with the justfile directory.

mk-targets-runner.dryrun.make.markdownDescription:
The command to run makefiles targets in dry-run mode.

- `<fsPath>` will be replaced with the makefile path.
- `<name>` will be replaced with the target name.
- `<dir>` will be replaced with the makefile directory.

mk-targets-runner.dryrun.just.markdownDescription:
The command to run justfiles targets in dry-run mode.

- `<fsPath>` will be replaced with the justfile path.
- `<name>` will be replaced with the target name.
- `<dir>` will be replaced with the justfile directory.

mk-targets-runner.filePattern.make.description: The glob patterns to match makefiles.

mk-targets-runner.filePattern.just.description: The glob patterns to match justfiles.

mk-targets-runner.excludedFoldersPattern.description: The glob patterns to exclude folders.
